clinical_study.brief_title: Testing the Efficacy of Different Dosages of Lercanidipine to Reduce Hypertensive Blood Pressure in Normal Weight and Obese Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Double-Blind, Randomized, Multicenter, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel, Dose-Titration Study to Assess the Efficacy of Lercanidipine 10 mg and 20 mg Once Daily p. o. in Hypertensive Subjects (I or II WHO) With Elevated Body Weight.

brief_summary.textblock: A double blind study to examine the safety and efficacy of different dosages of lercanidipine in normal weight and obese patients with hypertension

primary_outcome.measure: change from baseline of systolic blood pressure (BPs) after 4 weeks of treatment

secondary_outcome.measure: Blood pressure, response rate, normalization rate, pulse rate, lipid profile, safety and tolerability. Measures after 4, 8, 12 weeks.
